title: Help i can't log into league of legends
body: I can't log into league of legends on eune but I can log into euw. I don't know what is causing this, and i'm wondering if i'm the only one that's having this problem.

replies.body: Dude I'm having the same problem!

oh wait this is my own post
fk

Hey guys, I'm not seeing any issues logging into EUW but the rising reports I'm seeing on the boards makes me feel like something could be going on.  To help troubleshoot, go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that nothing is blocking your connection from reaching the authentication server.  I'll check around as well to see if something's up.

Thanks for the fast replies! It might be as simple as a internet node could be down somewhere that causes certain people like myself and others to be unable to get past the authenticating server.

I have tried to reconnect multiple times now and sometimes I get into the position queue when many tries to login at the same time, so the client is logging me in but it completely stops at the authenticating part.
I'm also having the same authentication issue, it was fine for an hour or 2 and then suddenly disconnects me and just authenticates forever when i try to log in. I'm from Finland and my ISP is DNA.
Me and my gf is having the same problem here in DK also on EUW... Cant get past authentication
What ISP are you guys using?
Jeg er ogs√• dansker (I'm also danish) (I live in denmark too)
